attributes.action: review the Child and Working Tax Credit system so that it may provide help and support to those that need it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The annual issue over overpayments and the initial issues in establishing a claim with HMRC lead to families struggling to support their children and make it difficult for  them to maintain employment. 

As such, the Government should seek to review the Tax Credits system and ensure that:

New claims are dealt with quickly and efficiently – Periods of 4 to 6 weeks before payments start can lead families into difficulty with childcare and other costs, preventing employment and leading to poverty.

Call centre staff are properly briefed and informed, enabling them to solve issues when they arise. - aware of personal situations, understanding that this is more than just money to the people they talk to. 

Overpayments are not made, and where they are, a fair and proportionate method is established for their repayment without causing hardship to the families they are designed to support.
